    public class StorageShellCommands
extends com.i2rd.cms.util.AbstractShellCommands

      • addStreamStorage

        @CliCommand(value="add stream storage",
            help="Create a stream storage module")
public void addStreamStorage(@CliOption(key="purpose",help="The purpose of the module",mandatory=true)
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String purpose,
                                                                                                                        @CliOption(key="type",help="The type of the module",mandatory=true)
                                                                                                                        StorageShellCommands.StreamSorageType type,
                                                                                                                        @CliOption(key="location",help="The S3 bucket or native file system path to use for storage",unspecifiedDefaultValue="")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String location,
                                                                                                                        @CliOption(key="site",help="The hostname of the site to assign the new module to",optionContext="include-disabled")
                                                                                                                        @Nullable net.proteusframework.internet.http.Site site,
                                                                                                                        @CliOption(key="fallback",help="The ID, S3 URI or path of the copy-on-write fallback storage module",unspecifiedDefaultValue="")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String fallbackModule)
        Create a stream storage module.
        Parameters:
        purpose - The purpose of the module
        type - The type of module to create
        location - The S3 bucket or native file system path to use for storage
        site - The site to assign the new module to
        fallbackModule - The ID, S3 URI or path of the copy-on-write fallback storage module

      • changeStreamStorage

        @CliCommand(value="change stream storage",
            help="Change the stream storage module for a file system entity")
public void changeStreamStorage(@CliOption(key="module",help="The ID, S3 URI or path of the new storage module",mandatory=true)
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String module,
                                                                                                                                                         @CliOption(key={"file","dir"},help="The ID or path to the file or directory",mandatory=true)
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String fse,
                                                                                                                                                         @CliOption(key="quiet",help="Quiet; do not list the file system entities that were updated",unspecifiedDefaultValue="false",specifiedDefaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                         boolean quiet,
                                                                                                                                                         @CliOption(key="limit",help="Stop after moving the specified number of files and directories (default: no limit)",unspecifiedDefaultValue="-1",specifiedDefaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                         long limit)
        Change the stream storage module for a FileSystemEntity and its children. An authenticated principal is required.
        Parameters:
        module - the new storage module
        fse - the FileSystemEntity to move
        quiet - whether to display progress
        limit - stop after moving the specified number of files and directories. Use -1 for no limit.
